content: You wrote — The gravity of Trump’s ascension requires an effective strategy, not merely the most emotionally tempting one. All of the comments on this article are thoughtful and well considered. I wish I had an easy solution. I have Trump supporters among family, friends and neighbors. I try to find the values we share and I don’t shut up that the economic impacts upon them and the personal impacts of what they have helped to cause are real and that they will experience them. Hopefully in 4 or 8 years they will vote in reaction to it. The deeper issues though are serious and not so easily corrected.
